title: Heavy
content:
Heavy Has increased weight. GlaivesGreataxesGreatswordsHalberdsHeavy CrossbowsLongbowsMaulsPikes

Heavy is a Weapon Property in Baldur's Gate 3. Heavy grants Weapons more weight. Weapon Properties grant different weapon types, diverse features that are intrinsic to that specific weapon type.

Heavy Information

Has increased weight.

Weapon types that have Heavy

Glaives Greataxes Greatswords Halberds Heavy Crossbows Longbows Mauls Pikes Greatclubs

Heavy Notes & Tips

Heavy weapons giving small creatures like Gnomes or Halflings Disadvantage has NOT been implemented in BG3.
